text: "Little Big Girl" is the 12th episode of the 18th season of The Simpsons. It was first shown on the Fox network on February 11, 2007. It was written by Don Payne. Raymond S. Persi is the director of the episode. Natalie Portman guest stars as a girl named Darcy. == References == Category:The Simpsons episodes Category:2007 television episodes
title: Little Big Girl
